TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EnumerableToDispatchMarshaler extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomMarshaler

summary.span: 将 COM 接口封送处理到 .NET Framework 接口，反之亦然。

span.span: Marshals the COM interface to the .NET Framework interface, and vice versa.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当存在 DISPID 为`IDispatch` - 4 的成员时, 此自定义封送拆收器将进行封送处理并封送处理。 `IDispatch`This custom marshaler marshals `IDispatch` to and marshals to `IDispatch` when a member with a DISPID of -4 exists. 当你使用类型库导入程序 (tlbimp.exe) 来创建实现的类时, CLR 将自动使用此自定义封送拆收器来桥接 COM 枚举器和 .net 枚举器。When you use the Type Library Importer (Tlbimp.exe) to create a class that implements , the CLR uses this custom marshaler automatically to bridge COM enumerators and .NET enumerators. 调用会调用, 其 DISPID 为-4, 反之亦然。 `IDispatch.Invoke`Calling results in `IDispatch.Invoke` being called with a DISPID of -4, and vice versa.

MemberSignature.Value: public EnumerableToDispatchMarshaler ();
.method public static specialname rtspecialname void .cctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: EnumerableToDispatchMarshaler();

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 和后续版本中将删除此成员。This member is removed in the .NET Framework version 2.0 and subsequent versions.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void CleanUpManagedData (object pManagedObj);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CleanUpManagedData(object pManagedObj) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub CleanUpManagedData (pManagedObj As Object)
public: virtual void CleanUpManagedData(System::Object ^ pManagedObj);
abstract member CleanUpManagedData : obj -> unit override this.CleanUpManagedData : obj -> unit

span.span: The managed object to be destroyed.

summary.span: 不再需要时执行必要的托管数据的清除。

span.span: Performs necessary cleanup of the managed data when it is no longer needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CLR 调用此方法来清理方法中分配的托管数据。The CLR calls this method to clean up managed data allocated in the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void CleanUpNativeData (IntPtr pNativeData);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CleanUpNativeData(native int pNativeData) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub CleanUpNativeData (pNativeData As IntPtr)
public: virtual void CleanUpNativeData(IntPtr pNativeData);
abstract member CleanUpNativeData : nativeint -> unit override this.CleanUpNativeData : nativeint -> unit

param.name: pNativeData
param.span: 指向要销毁的非托管数据的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the unmanaged data to be destroyed.

summary.span: 不再需要时执行必要的非托管数据的清除。

span.span: Performs necessary cleanup of the unmanaged data when it is no longer needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CLR 调用此方法以清理方法中分配的非托管数据。The CLR calls this method to clean up the unmanaged data allocated in the method.

static member GetInstance : string -> System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomMarshaler

param.name: pstrCookie
param.span: 可以由自定义封送拆收器使用的字符串“cookie”参数。

span.span: String "cookie" parameter that can be used by the custom marshaler.

summary.span: 返回自定义封送拆收器的实例。

span.span: Returns an instance of the custom marshaler.

returns.span: 自定义封送拆收器的实例。

span.span: An instance of the custom marshaler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有自定义封送拆收器都必须实现此方法, 但它不属于接口定义。All custom marshalers must implement this method, although it is not part of the interface definition.

Public Overridable Function GetNativeDataSize () As Integer
public: virtual int GetNativeDataSize();
abstract member GetNativeDataSize : unit -> int override this.GetNativeDataSize : unit -> int

summary.span: 返回要封送处理的非托管数据的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Returns the size in bytes of the unmanaged data to be marshaled.

returns.span: -1 指示此封送拆收器处理的类型不是值类型。

span.span: -1 to indicate the type this marshaler handles is not a value type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 .NET Framework 中不支持值类型的自定义封送处理, 因此此方法始终返回-1。Because custom marshaling of value types is not supported in the .NET Framework, this method always returns -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual IntPtr MarshalManagedToNative (object pManagedObj);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance native int MarshalManagedToNative(object pManagedObj) cil managed
Public Overridable Function MarshalManagedToNative (pManagedObj As Object) As IntPtr
public: virtual IntPtr MarshalManagedToNative(System::Object ^ pManagedObj);
abstract member MarshalManagedToNative : obj -> nativeint override this.MarshalManagedToNative : obj -> nativeint

span.span: The managed object to be converted.

summary.span: 将一个对象从托管代码封送处理到非托管代码。

span.span: Marshals an object from managed code to unmanaged code.

returns.span: 指向非托管对象的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the unmanaged object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CLR 通过托管对象的指定实例调用此方法, 将该对象从托管代码转换为非托管代码, 并返回指向相应非托管对象的指针, 该对象表示该对象的 COM 视图。The CLR calls this method with the specified instance of a managed object to convert that object from managed code to unmanaged code, and it returns a pointer to the appropriate unmanaged object, representing the COM view of that object.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual object MarshalNativeToManaged (IntPtr pNativeData);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object MarshalNativeToManaged(native int pNativeData) cil managed
Public Overridable Function MarshalNativeToManaged (pNativeData As IntPtr) As Object
public: virtual System::Object ^ MarshalNativeToManaged(IntPtr pNativeData);
abstract member MarshalNativeToManaged : nativeint -> obj override this.MarshalNativeToManaged : nativeint -> obj

param.name: pNativeData
param.span: 指向要转换的非托管对象的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the unmanaged object to be converted.

summary.span: 将一个对象从非托管代码封送处理到托管代码。

span.span: Marshals an object from unmanaged code to managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CLR 使用指向非托管对象的指定指针调用此方法, 将该对象从非托管代码转换为托管代码, 并返回一个托管对象, 该对象表示非托管数据的托管视图。The CLR calls this method with the specified pointer to an unmanaged object to convert that object from unmanaged code to managed code, and returns a managed object representing the managed view of the unmanaged data.
